☰ Sustainability Management

About the Author

Born in the Philippines and migrated to Cairo, Egypt at 11, Allysa Aguilar is an undergraduate student taking Bachelor of Science in Chemical Engineering with a minor in Humanistic and Sustainability Management.

Her interests include:

  • Reading reddit stories
  • Annoying their family cat, Loki
  • Trying out different hobbies instead of catching up on homework

About the Project

This series of reflective blog journals is a product of a class called Sustainability Management (ACMSUST) in A.Y. 2020-2021. Its purpose is to simply show my own views on specific topics pertaining to sustainability management throught out the duration of the course.
